pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a snowy landscape featuring three white yurts and several leafless trees scattered around. The camera slowly pans to the right, revealing more of the snowy terrain and additional trees. As the camera continues to move, a red house with a snow-covered roof comes into view on the right side of the frame. The camera further pans right, showing more of the red house and a wooden structure in the foreground.
